snippet: Four Americans are leading the way for the next generation of great players.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column examines run of victories by young American chess prodigies Awonder Liang, Samuel Sevian, Jeffrey Xiong and Kayden Troff; says four are leading the way for the next generation of great players.
lead_paragraph: Four Americans are leading the way for the next generation of great players.

headline.main: A Run of Significant Victories for the Game’s Young Stars
headline.print_headline: A Run of Significant Victories for the Game’s Young Stars
